column2: Role & responsibilities     Create and manage strategic plans for new projects.   Manage stakeholder for new/existing project initiative.    Support tech implementation of new projects & existing projects.   Support the development of strategic initiatives aligned with company goals.   Create compelling Data Modeling and presentation.  Support & lead the tech implementation, vendor management.  Track and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of strategic initiatives.     Qualifications   Bachelors / Master's /MBA from a reputed institute (pref. min Tier 2)   2-3 years of experience in operation management, or a similar role within the energy industry (a plus).   Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.   Benefits   Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects.   Work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.  Gain exposure to senior leadership and make a real impact on the company's future.  Be part of a team that is passionate about the energy industry.
column11: Project Management, Business Operations, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Strategic Planning, Operations Management

column2: Job Description : 1. Driving & implementing Business Excellence framework 2. Develop Performance Score card & tracking matrix 3. PMO role - Organizing meetings and capturing action items & follow-up for completion on time 4. Drive initiatives: KAIZEN, 5S, Visual Management, Ideation 5. Preparing teams for participation in External Competitions 6. Prepare Dashboards on Power BI & Excel 7. Preparing & circulation of weekly OE communication and awareness mailers 8. Preparation of MIS (weekly, monthly, Quarterly & Annually) 9. Facilitating Circle activities for zones 10. Organizing all workshops, R&R, events, and campaigns 11. Organizing & conducting Classroom and Virtual Training sessions  Technical skills required: 1. Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certified + TPM 2. Strong Project Management, Statistical, Analytical skills 3. Excellent skills in developing Dashboards, Excel forms & Participation in Competitions 4. IT Skills: Expert in advance MS Excel, MS PowerPoint, Power BI 5. PMP Certification Behavior skills required: 1. Ability to handle multiple initiatives and adapt to changing priorities & challenges 2. Proven ability of influencing, negotiating and follow-up 3. Encourage open exchange of ideas and knowledge sharing 4. People and communication skills 5. Good at preparing & delivering presentation

column2: Industry and Market Analysis  - Track the oil,gas & energy sector as well as major end-application industries for emerging trends that may impact demand-supply scenarios of current and new products.          - Prepare periodic industry analysis reports based on secondary research, quarterly/annual results of key oil,gas & energy industry players, capex announcements and other news articles.  - Conduct data analysis to uncover patterns in consumption including substitution threat to end products.  - Track developments in various regional markets, including regulatory changes, that may have a bearing on the current and future growth plans of the oil,gas & energy industry.  - Understand and articulate the impact of capacity additions/shutdowns, trade flows, competitor actions and exchange rate movements for the demand supply situation of key products.  - Suggest new product or value chain ideas based on industry and market data analyzed.  - Track new products planned by competitors  through a systematic analysis of available sources such as EC applications, etc.  - Conduct competitor benchmarking by carrying out opex/capex analysis and comparison of duties and other regulatory incentives across customers or regions.  - Detailed market report preparation on new sectors and segments e.g. Electronic Chemicals, Circular Economy etc. -  Experience in Gasoline Blending is a must  Business Case formulation and Project Management   - Articulate business case for identified opportunities.   - Conduct sensitivity analysis on key assumptions in the business case.   - Identify risks to the business case and help to devise mitigation plans.   - Prepare presentations for top management and investment committee for seeking approvals on required investments.   - Explore avenues to initiate new projects in the existing facilities and conduct cost-benefit analysis for the same.   - Do scheduling and planning for all project activities for various project stage gates and monitor the progress   - Prioritize, align and sync the schedules of respective teams linked to strategic masterplan, drive to implement the plan.   - Monitor and drive projects for its timely completion, report the progress to provide complete visibility and prioritize/provide recommendations when there is a change schedule.    Business Processes   - Look for opportunities to improve and add to the core processes to make them more practical and suited to business needs.   - Lead identification and optimal utilization of digital tools for effective analysis and prioritization.
column11: Gasoline blending, Secondary Research, Market Intelligence, Market Research And Analysis, Research Reports

column2: Manager, Commercial Excellence  Position Location: India HQ Position Reporting: Head of Commercial Excellence / Senior Manager Commercial Excellence  We are seeking a  Manager, Commercial Excellence  in the Flexible Packaging industry, who will work on a wide scope of commercial projects and initiatives, with objectives of driving revenue growth and profit improvement. The position is part of a new, fast-paced Commercial Excellence team with the aim to instill commercial excellence culture and best practices. With a high degree of independence and ownership, this position is responsible for tender, price, and contract management; profit improvement initiatives; training and mentoring internal stakeholders on commercial excellence; commercial analytics and developing new commercial and pricing processes and capabilities.  The ideal candidate has commercial excellence and pricing experience, advanced analytical skills, can-do attitude, ability to train people and experience in change management and driving major projects from start to finish. The position requires hands-on work and execution through close partnership with multiple stakeholders from Sales, R&D, Operations, Sourcing, Finance, and others.  Primary Responsibilities: Drives profitable growth through improved pricing, commercial terms, and execution based on commercial best practices: Profit improvement :  drives programs to accelerate growth in new business (new customers, share of wallet growth) and profit improvement including price recommendations and commercial terms. performs business discovery and analyses to identify profit leakages and partners with stakeholders to close profit leakages to improve profitability. develops profitability improvement plans for new and existing customers and partners with Sales owners and other stakeholders to execute the plans. Tender management and pricing support:   partners with the Sales owner, the cost estimation team, and others on optimized execution of bids/tenders/RFQs; identifying customer needs, competitive dynamics, analyzing the opportunity, developing recommended prices, customer profitability analysis, risk evaluation, etc. reviews and recommends pricing, commercial terms, contract language and leads deal and proposal development for new and existing customer accounts. in partnership with Sales owners, supports the calculation and execution of due price adjustments in most optimized, timely and consistent ways. Contract management:  in partnership with the Sales owner, negotiates or supports the negotiation of customer contracts.  leads contract renewals, preparations for customer negotiations and agreements with customers, continuously driving the improvement of commercial terms;  catalogues key commercial and operational terms from customer contracts in a database for actionable analyses, evaluation of opportunities, price adjustments, etc. Commercial training, capabilities, improvements, and analytics:  identifies opportunities for commercial improvements and partners with Sales owners on execution. supports and drives improved decision-making through data-driven analyses and insights; contributes to the development of business analysis tools and capabilities for pricing and commercial analytics. collects, analyzes, and disseminates to the Commercial and other relevant teams competitive and business intelligence, as well as commercial and pricing insights useful in commercial decision making. performs multiple ongoing and ad-hoc analyses as requested or as needed to identify opportunities and to drive projects and improvements. contributes to the development and improvement of pricing guidelines and recommendations. helps to improve standards for commercial terms and ensures compliance to company standards. helps to develop and conduct training activities on pricing and commercial standards, best practices, and capabilities for the larger Commercial team. Key Performance Indicators: The position is expected and accountable to consistently demonstrate the following behavior: Communicates with team and stakeholders pro-actively, timely and clearly regarding work progress, timelines, obstacles, results, and challenges.  Understands and communicates the why: ensures to understand why projects and activities are done and how they are connected to company goals; clearly communicates the why to stakeholders to effectively influence them for process change and improvement. Aligns own activities and goals with business goals; targets actions to execute effectively; plans and prioritizes work to meet important timelines and stated deadlines. Earns stakeholder trust, strives for self-development; offers and accepts honest feedback. Partners and works effectively with others in a collaborative team environment; treats them with respect; recognizes cultural and other differences; recognizes performance of others; celebrates wins. Education & Preferred Experience: Degree in Business, Finance, Engineering, Marketing, or other relevant degree 8+ years of overall business experience 4+ years of experience in Pricing, Business Intelligence, Commercial Finance, FP&A, Sales Operations, or other relevant roles, with progressive growth in responsibilities Experience in flexible packaging is highly preferred. Proven experience and skills in project management and change management. Experience initiating, building, and leading big initiatives with multiple stakeholders. Must be self-directed, self-motivated and a self-starter. Strong analytical mindset, advanced analytical skills, and a proven record of building sophisticated analytics in Excel. Advanced Excel skills required. Experience in price development and building sophisticated pricing models. Experience performing advanced data analysis, articulating, and explaining analyses and presenting results to multiple levels within an organization. High business acumen and experience of effective partnership with key stakeholders  Ability to communicate effectively, verbally and in writing with all levels within a complex organization. up to 20% international or regional travel may be required.   SCAM ALERT: Protect Yourself from Fake Job Offers!  Attention Job Seekers, Beware of fraudulent job offers claiming to be from Huhtamaki! Scammers are circulating fake opportunities using our name and deceiving applicants. How to stay secured? Verify legitimacy: Huhtamaki's official recruitment process is managed by our HR department or authorized partners. Check official channels: Genuine job openings are posted on our official career website and reputable platforms like 'LinkedIn.' Confirm emails: Legitimate communication will come from @Huhtamaki.com or huhtamaki@myworkday.com. Huhtamaki Will NEVER: Ask for money or personal details upfront. Use Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or non-Huhtamaki email domains. Offer international positions with non-local conditions. What to Do? Verify suspicious emails: Email hr@huhtamaki.com or careers.india@huhtamaki.com. Report fraud: Contact law enforcement if you've been targeted. Spread the word to protect our community!
column11: Pricing, Projects, FPNA, Pricing Strategy, RFQS, Pricing Analysis, Project Management, Sales Operations, Commercial Strategy, Business Operations, Salesforce
